experience: You and Tammie both know Mark Shander, Steven Roberts, and 103 others

Founder of Athena Hair Extensions, Tammie Bradford has been in the industry of hair for more than 25 years.  Tammie has mastered the art of hair extensions; she is a hair extension specialist and master class instructor. Tammie has educated and certified more than 300 stylists on how to master the process of applying hair extensions in a safe and non-damaging way for clients seeking hair extensions and real hair growth.With more than 20 years of experience in applying hair extensions of all kinds, Tammie found the best fusion hair extensions on the market.
